title: Fixed Points and Cycles of the Kaprekar Transformation: 2. Even bases
abstract:
We develop a classification of the fixed points and cycles of the Kaprekar
transformation in even bases. The most numerous fixed points and cycles are
those we denote symmetric and almost-symmetric; the structure of the cycles of
these classes in base $b$ is determined by subgroups and cosets in the
multiplicative group modulo $b-1$. We provide methods and formulae for
enumerating the fixed points and cycles of these and other classes. A detailed
survey of the fixed points and cycles is provided for bases 4, 6 and 8,
including a rigorous proof that the classification is complete in base 4.
